# HELP kepler_pod_cpu_watts Pod CPU watts
# TYPE kepler_pod_cpu_watts gauge
kepler_pod_cpu_watts{pod="kepler",namespace="kepler-system"} 25.5
kepler_pod_cpu_watts{pod="ml-training-job",namespace="ai-team"} 45.2
kepler_pod_cpu_watts{pod="web-app",namespace="production"} 12.3

# HELP kepler_pod_memory_watts Pod memory watts
# TYPE kepler_pod_memory_watts gauge
kepler_pod_memory_watts{pod="kepler",namespace="kepler-system"} 8.2
kepler_pod_memory_watts{pod="ml-training-job",namespace="ai-team"} 12.3
kepler_pod_memory_watts{pod="web-app",namespace="production"} 5.1

# HELP kepler_pod_gpu_watts Pod GPU watts
# TYPE kepler_pod_gpu_watts gauge
kepler_pod_gpu_watts{pod="kepler",namespace="kepler-system"} 0.0
kepler_pod_gpu_watts{pod="ml-training-job",namespace="ai-team"} 0.0
kepler_pod_gpu_watts{pod="web-app",namespace="production"} 0.0

# HELP kepler_node_cpu_watts Node CPU watts
# TYPE kepler_node_cpu_watts gauge
kepler_node_cpu_watts 125.8

# HELP kepler_node_memory_watts Node memory watts
# TYPE kepler_node_memory_watts gauge
kepler_node_memory_watts 45.2

# HELP kepler_node_cpu_usage_ratio Node CPU usage ratio
# TYPE kepler_node_cpu_usage_ratio gauge
kepler_node_cpu_usage_ratio 0.35
